tweets.text: @SloughCouncil @McDonaldsUK Thanks for this!

Day Nine.
The pollution is STILL emanating from Furness Vale Marina, stretching over a mile to New Mills. The boom at Bridge 29 isn't working and the polluting waste oil is just as bad as it was a week ago. Why is the slick still not being stopped at Bridge 30? @CanalRiverTrust https://t.co/9lxlWtbhQe

urls.title: Environment Agency silent on removal of pollution goal from performance report
urls.description: The Environment Agency will not be drawn on why it has dropped a target to reduce the number of pollution incidents from a regular report on its performance against environmental objectives, despite requests for an explanation from ENDS.

tweets.text:
The @EnvAgency will not be drawn on why it has dropped a target to reduce the number of pollution incidents from a regular report on its performance against environmental objectives, despite requests for an explanation from @TheENDSReport.
https://t.co/6vI9ZC2H8l

Just to remind you all that just 24 hours ago the @EnvAgency admitted it will no longer be publishing serious pollution incidents and won't be recording them against their annual performance targets. https://t.co/Cu3VPjycTa

There are currently a number of flood warnings and flood alerts in place in Cumbria. 
To keep up to date with the latest warnings visit - https://t.co/hC6Mnvkt1B

üåßÔ∏èRain is forecasted to continue today, take care if you are driving. 

@EnvAgencyNW https://t.co/Glayd72tVF

"The net effects will collapse ecosystems, slash crop yields, take out the infrastructure that our civilisation depends on, and destroy the basis of the modern economy and modern society."

https://t.co/cR2jl3o0r3

Rain üåßÔ∏è is still expected throughout the day in #Cumbria. Stay safe, always keep your distance from swollen rivers and don‚Äôt drive through flood water. 

just 30cm of fast flowing water is enough to move your car üöó

#Prepareactsurvive https://t.co/ruBakdutZ9
This is shameful and revolting in every way possible. What, if anything, are you doing about this @EnvAgency? https://t.co/B3tGmv2LNi

urls.title: HebWeb News 2021 - New bursary to help students researching flood management
urls.description: A new annual bursary has been set up to support Master's students investigating natural flood management. The bursary is named in recognition of the work of the founder of Treesponsibility and The Source Partnership, Penny Eastwood, otherwise known as Dongria Kondh.

tweets.text:
Great article about the new student bursary @UniversityLeeds 
awarded to Sophie Tankard to study natural #flood management #NFM

Funded by @EnvAgencyYNE @slowtheflow_UK & @Calderdale in recognition of 
Dongria Kondh @treesponsibilit 

@hebdenbridgeweb 
https://t.co/nSoYF0lbAB https://t.co/ES8RnW6Dnh

tweets.text: @andyksheffield @EnvAgencyYNE Hopefully some nice @EnvAgency branding and a public info sign will explain to people what the site does, until I worked at the EA I never knew it even existed.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Nature
entity.description: Consistently stunning documentaries transport viewers to far-flung locations ranging from the torrid African plains to the chilly splendors of icy Antarctica. The show's primary focus is on animals and ecosystems around the world. A comic book based on the show, meant to be used an as educational tool for kids, was briefly distributed to museums and schools at no cost in the mid-2000s.

@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency Say this again. If the same amount of sewage flowed down each individual highstreets action would be taken, but a river it is deemed acceptable as people don't care, its not their problem. When we loose what we have remember you was warned. This really boils my p**s

With yet another local authority signing up enhance and protect Staffordshire‚Äôs #NatureRecoveryNetwork we edge closer to full countywide adoption. @CraigBennett3 @StaffsWildlife @NE_WestMids @EnvAgencyMids @WildlifeTrusts https://t.co/9cwjev7DYG

Kay Johnstone @EnvAgency tells our #Adaptation Reporting webinar that the EA's 3rd report will set out how and where transformational change will be required and introduce an urgency score to identify where most pressing action needed. #RacetoResilience #CIWEMDigitalSeries

@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency Have I got this right? 
48 hours ago the @EnvAgency say better regulation is needed to protect the environment, and 24 hrs later they say they will no longer be publishing serious pollution incidents of and won't be recording them against their annual performance targets. https://t.co/0IefMSag90

So as the @EnvAgency is no longer fit for purpose it decides ‚Äòwhy bother doing any part of the job it is tasked to do?‚Äô Nothing recorded, so nothing to see here. Move along. What total and utter disgrace, the leadership of this department has abjectly failed & needed sacking. https://t.co/f3h1mIeANT

Thank you to those who called us about an oil pollution on the River Dove near #Ashbourne #Derbyshire

We're working to locate the source & to minimise the impact on the #environment
